replies.body:
Yeah, I've seen you rage a lot in chat, it isn't excessive at least, try to avoid doing those type of things.
I'll forgive you, now it's up to you, do you want to change or stay the same?
Welcome to the forums! Feel free to ask me any questions if you have some :P

P.S: Why did you rage so much in chat? :c
